Awesome! works perfect
Awesome! works perfect!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

The only reason why this game is compressible so much is because it is a direct port of the SNES game. SNES games don't really take up that much room. I actually used wii backup manager to convert it into a wbfs file, then back into an iso with wii backup manager (weird but it causes windows to see the iso as 4.7 gb, but the size on disk amount was only about 300mb), and then used wii scruber to remove the update on the disk (the update was about 2-3 hundred megabytes.) 

Most Wii games are not going to get this small. All wii iso's are 4.7 or 8.5gb. There's the amount of space it actually has on the disk and then the rest is just empty data. Most wii iso's will go down to about 2-3gb. This game was just a real exception.
